code: import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./homepage.css';import{FaBookOpen,FaMicrophoneAlt,FaFolderOpen,FaHands}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Homepage(){const cards=[{title:"Learning Module",text:"Interactive modules to learn Indian Sign Language effectively.",img:"/learn.png",link:"/dashboard/home/1",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBookOpen,{})},{title:"Speech To Sign",text:"Convert spoken words into sign language animations.",img:"/speech.png",link:"/dashboard/home/2",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaMicrophoneAlt,{})},{title:"Custom Library",text:"Save and review your favorite signs in one place.",img:"/lib.png",link:"/dashboard/home/3",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaFolderOpen,{})},{title:"Sign To Speech",text:"Use camera or input to translate signs into speech.",img:"/sign.png",link:"/dashboard/home/4",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHands,{})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"body-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards-grid",children:cards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:card.link,className:"card-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"custom-card fade-in",style:{animationDelay:"".concat(index*0.2,"s")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:card.img,alt:card.title,className:"card-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-icon",children:card.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:card.text})]})]})},index))})});}export default Homepage;
